messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard We livin' station. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everybody is to abandon their jobs to discover the source of this, if it's blob we are truly fucked

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to We livin' station. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on We livin' station have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This is ERT Commander, find the blob and let us know

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I already put weaponjs in the chapel, somebody get the temp gun from armory i left it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.
